Key: Ah, I'm finally alone.

(I thought I'd finally regained my peaceful life.
Who would have thought it would be this
chaotic...)
Oh, a phone call...? Oh... it's Reine-san.

(Reine Murasame-san. She's like an assistant
to Kotori, and the main analyst of Ratatoskr.
She's also my assistant homeroom teacher.)

(When negotiating with the Spirits, she and
Kotori often give me instructions for dating.)

(I already have a bad feeling, hearing the phone
ring like this... But I can't ignore it.)
...Hello?
Hey, Shin. Seems like you did well on your\ndate today.

Well, today was more of an accident than a
real mission.
No, no... What you do on a daily basis is\nwhat's important. If you don't give food to the\nfish you caught, you'd just be a horrible man.
The fish I caught...
Anyways, let's cut to the chase. You see, I\ncreated a new game.
Okay...

(Huh? What does she want me to do with that
information? Wait... Reine-san created a game?
I have a very bad feeling about this.)
I like your expression. You're very sharp,\nShin. Exactly what you're thinking. I've created\nthe masterpiece, 'My Little Shido'.

I knew it! Jeez, when did you find the time to
do that?

(My Little Shido... Before I started this
reckless series of dates with the Spirits, she
had me train on that game.)

(It's pretty much a gal game... Kind of in the
wrong direction, if you ask me.)
Right. We all made it without sleeping or\nresting. We would love for you to play it.\nI want you to come to the Fraxinus.

If it's a game, I can play it at home... And
besides, I need to make dinner tonight.
You still have some time before dinner.\nI need you to come to the Fraxinus to play\nit right now.
Hmm... Well, fine I'll go.
Thanks. Then I'll prepare for your transfer,\nso come outside.

(*Sigh*... I wonder what kind of game she
made this time...)
